guide.title: How do I write a blog post?
guide.intro: A blog post is a personal text you publish on the internet. Here's how it works!

steps.s1Desc: Pick a topic that interests you. It can be an experience, opinion, or report.
steps.s2Desc: Your title should spark curiosity. It's the first thing readers see.
steps.s3Desc: Start with 2-3 sentences that introduce the topic and make readers want more.
steps.s4Desc: This is where the real content goes. Use paragraphs, subheadings, and images.
steps.s5Desc: Summarize or ask readers a question – this encourages comments!
steps.s6Desc: Read through your text one more time. When everything's good, your teacher clicks 'Publish'.
